file.name: timetables3.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0" info: description: | You can use the interactive documentation to customise your API response using the available query parameters. If you are registered and logged in, you will be given a full response. Otherwise you will be given an example response. ### Ready to use the API? [View developer documentation](/guidance/requirements/?section=api) ### First time API user? [Guide me](/guide-me/) title: Timetables data API version: "1.0.0" servers: - url: "/api/v1" tags: - name: timetables description: Interact with timetable datasets paths: /dataset: get: tags: - timetables summary: Find timetables description: Returns all timetables parameters: - name: adminArea in: query type: array description: Limit results to datasets with services that stop within the specified area(s). Comma separated list of admin areas defined by their AtcoAreaCode as specified in the NPTG area codes. schema: type: array items: type: string example: ["060", "205"] style: form explode: false - name: noc in: query description: Limit results to data sets published by an operator identified by the specified National Operator Code. Comma separated list of National Operator Codes schema: type: array items: type: string example: [SCGH, SCLI] style: form explode: false - name: limit in: query description: The maximum number of records to return schema: type: integer format: int64 default: 25 maximum: 100 example: 25 - name: offset in: query description: Return results that match the query starting from the specified offset.
e.g. &offset=10&limit=25 returns results from 11 to 36 schema: type: integer format: int64 maximum: 100 default: 0 example: 0 - name: search in: query description: Return data sets where the data set name, data set description, organisation name, or admin area name contain the specified value schema: type: string example: Stagecoach - name: status in: query description: Limit results to data sets with the specified status. schema: type: string example: published enum: - published - error - expired - inactive - name: endDateStart in: query description: Limit results to data sets with services with end dates after this date. schema: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" - name: endDateEnd in: query description: Limit results to data sets with services with end dates before this date. schema: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" - name: modifiedDate in: query description: Limit results to data sets that have been created/updated since the specified date. schema: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" - name: startDateStart in: query description: Limit results to data sets with services with start dates after this date. schema: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" - name: startDateEnd in: query description: Limit results to data sets with services with start dates before this date. schema: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" - name: dqRag in: query description: Limit results to data sets with the specified String. schema: type: string example: green enum: - red - amber - green - name: bodsCompliance in: query description: Limit results to data sets with the specified boolean value. schema: type: boolean example: true responses: "200": description: successful operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/TimetableResponse" "400": description: Invalid query parameters supplied /dataset/{datasetID}: get: tags: - timetables summary: Find dataset by ID description: Returns a single dataset parameters: - name: datasetID in: path description: ID of dataset to return required: true schema: type: integer format: int64 example: 86 responses: "200": description: successful operation content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Timetable" "404": description: Dataset not found content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse" components: schemas: TimetableResponse: type: object properties: count: type: integer format: int64 example: 2345 next: type: uri nullable: true example: https://data.bus-data.dft.gov.uk/api/v1/dataset/?limit=25&offset=50 previous: type: uri nullable: true example: https://data.bus-data.dft.gov.uk/api/v1/dataset/?limit=25&offset=25 results: type: array items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Timetable" Timetable: type: object properties: id: type: integer format: int64 example: 1 created: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" modified: type: string format: date-time example: "2021-01-01T12:45:00" operatorName: type: string example: Stagecoach noc: type: array items: type: string example: [BDNY, CLTL] name: type: string example: Stagecoach_Stockport_Manchester City Centre_20200828" description: type: string example: Stagecoach Manchester comment: type: string example: Automatically detected change in data set status: type: string enum: [published, error, expired, inactive] example: inactive url: type: string format: uri example: https://data.bus-data.dft.gov.uk/timetable/dataset/6/download/ extension: type: string example: zip lines: type: array items: type: string example: ["1", "10"] firstStartDate: type: string format: date-time example: "2020-08-28T00:00:00+00:00" firstEndDate: type: string format: date-time example: "2020-11-28T23:59:00+00:00" lastEndDate: type: string format: date-time example: "2020-11-28T23:59:00+00:00" adminAreas: type: array items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/AdminArea" localities: type: array items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Locality" dqScore: type: string example: "100%" dqRag: type: string enum: [red, amber, green] example: green bodsCompliance: type: boolean nullable: true example: true AdminArea: type: object properties: atco_code: type: string example: "060" name: type: string example: Cheshire East Locality: type: object properties: gazetter_id: type: string example: E0028241 name: type: string example: Abbey Hey ErrorResponse: type: object properties: detail: type: string example: "Not found"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "TimetableResponse": parse schema: property "next": parse schema: unexpected schema type: "uri"
